Features - Shareable Links: Share your documents securely by sending a custom link. - Custom Branding: Add a custom domain and your own branding. - Analytics: Gain insights through document tracking and soon page-by-page analytics. - Self-hosted, Open-source: Host it yourself and customize it as needed.
